bill.summary:
Census Funding Cap Adjustment Act of 2018
This bill amends the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 to require specified adjustments to discretionary spending limits to accommodate appropriations for the decennial census to be conducted during 2020.
